meanings.sent1: She outfasts her friends during Ramadan.
meanings.sent2: He always outfasts his siblings during Lent.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise outfasts the hare in this fasting competition.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outfast her opponents is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner outfasts all others in her commitment to fasting.

meanings.definition: To abstain from food for a longer period than someone else.
meanings.sent1: He outfasts his coworkers when they do intermittent fasting.
meanings.sent2: She outfasts her classmates when they skip meals.
meanings.sent3: The cat outfasts the dog when it comes to fasting for treats.
meanings.sent4: His willpower to outfast his friends in fasting is remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The monk outfasts the rest of the monastery in his dedication to fasting rituals.
